functions.name: ALERT
functions.description:
ALERT
Display a message as an alert in the mobile app.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: A short title for the alert.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The message content for the alert.

functions.name: PROGRESS
functions.description:
PROGRESS
Display a non-dismissible progress message in the mobile app.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: A short title for the progress message.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The message content for the progress alert.

examples:
// Call with no parameters to dismiss the progress message.
PROGRESS()
